name: Lazy as Hell
description:
You play as Satan, who was too lazy to keep hordes of zombies from escaping to the elevator to stop them. Now you really have to fix this mess!

This game was made in 3 hours for Trijam #42

  • Used Godot Engine
  • Used Theme "Straight From The Underground

----- CONTROLS -----

  • Use WASD To Move
  • Use Arrow Keys To Shoot Pitchforks
